topicTitle: HOW TO POST PICS. ON FORUMS?

posts.postText: IF U KNOW HOW TO POST PICTURES ON THE FORUMUT THAT U TAKE IN FLOOD PLZZ TELL ME  ???

If using camera: >> 
BTW, for those who don't know how to use the camera in Flood, it's Left Click to take a screenshot, and the screenshots you take will appear here, C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\[STEAMLOGIN]\garrysmod\garrysmod\screenshots  
When you have your picture ready, go to the website www.filebox.me  and upload it. Take the direct link from the upload confirmation page and put it in your post like this.  http://DIRECT%20LINK

copy the direct url with .jpg extension or w/e, and insert into that format. voila :D
